title: Spack Broken -  ImportError: No module named ordereddict
body:
Hi

I pulled latest from ```develop``` and now I cannot run Spack:


```
sysadmin@node118[~/repos/spack]$ git log | head -n 20
commit 9e3f8c0d79d6f2c02f63599cf58527d596e1a445
Author: 健美猫 <weijianwen@gmail.com>
Date:   Fri Jan 12 21:50:07 2018 +0800

    A new package: ethminer. (#6908)

commit 03ff2a32aef078f7b091d0a8da1e6bb2a1491081
Author: Adam J. Stewart <ajstewart426@gmail.com>
Date:   Thu Jan 11 16:14:26 2018 -0600

    Reduce verbosity of build tests (#6901)

commit 070bcab7f2655b110447bb3b97e8733d98742e74
Author: Michael Kuhn <suraia@ikkoku.de>
Date:   Thu Jan 11 17:19:44 2018 +0100

    libbson, libmongoc: Update to 1.9.1 (#6900)

commit 5dd7baa61db49df86190f5773e1153e4f458125b
Author: stefanosoffia <stefanosoffia@users.noreply.github.com>

```

```
sysadmin@node118[~/repos/spack]$ git status .
# On branch develop
nothing to commit (working directory clean)
```


```
sysadmin@node118[~/repos/spack]$ spack
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/sysadmin/repos/spack/bin/spack", line 81, in <module>
    sys.exit(spack.main.main())
  File "/pbtech_mounts/homes027/sysadmin/repos/spack/lib/spack/spack/main.py", line 502, in main
    parser.print_help()
  File "/pbtech_mounts/homes027/sysadmin/repos/spack/lib/spack/external/argparse.py", line 2360, in print_help
    self._print_message(self.format_help(), file)
  File "/pbtech_mounts/homes027/sysadmin/repos/spack/lib/spack/spack/main.py", line 264, in format_help
    return self.format_help_sections(level)
  File "/pbtech_mounts/homes027/sysadmin/repos/spack/lib/spack/spack/main.py", line 141, in format_help_sections
    add_all_commands(self)
  File "/pbtech_mounts/homes027/sysadmin/repos/spack/lib/spack/spack/main.py", line 103, in add_all_commands
    parser.add_command(cmd)
  File "/pbtech_mounts/homes027/sysadmin/repos/spack/lib/spack/spack/main.py", line 253, in add_command
    module = spack.cmd.get_module(name)
  File "/pbtech_mounts/homes027/sysadmin/repos/spack/lib/spack/spack/cmd/__init__.py", line 89, in get_module
    level=0)
  File "/pbtech_mounts/homes027/sysadmin/repos/spack/lib/spack/spack/cmd/test.py", line 31, in <module>
    import pytest
  File "/pbtech_mounts/homes027/sysadmin/repos/spack/lib/spack/external/pytest.py", line 13, in <module>
    from _pytest.fixtures import fixture, yield_fixture
  File "/pbtech_mounts/homes027/sysadmin/repos/spack/lib/spack/external/_pytest/fixtures.py", line 25, in <module>
    from ordereddict import OrderedDict
ImportError: No module named ordereddict
```
